item.title: Apple Cut Base iPhone 16 Storage Options to Just 128GB
item.description: Following the debut of the iPhone 17 lineup on Tuesday, Apple quietly updated its iPhone 16 lineup so that the standard ‌iPhone 16‌ is now sold only in a 128GB configuration for $699. Th
